bioconda.name: metaxa
bioconda.summary: Improved Identification and Taxonomic Classification of Small and Large Subunit rRNA in Metagenomic Data.

biocontainers.name: metaxa
biocontainers.summary: Metaxa uses hidden markov models to identify, extract and classify small-subunit (ssu) rrna sequences (12s/16s/18s) of bacterial, archaeal, eukaryotic, chloroplast and mitochondrial origin in metagenomes and other large sequence sets

biotools.summary: Metaxa uses Hidden Markov Models to identify, extract and classify small-subunit (SSU) rRNA sequences (12S/16S/18S) of bacterial, archaeal, eukaryotic, chloroplast and mitochondrial origin in metagenomes and other large sequence sets

bioschemas.name: Metaxa
bioschemas.summary: Metaxa uses Hidden Markov Models to identify, extract and classify small-subunit (SSU) rRNA sequences (12S/16S/18S) of bacterial, archaeal, eukaryotic, chloroplast and mitochondrial origin in metagenomes and other large sequence sets
